message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product! As a valued customer, I'd like to assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and is in excellent condition. With a proven track record of 20% high-quality products sold so far, I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. Would you like to take advantage of this great opportunity?

They check for any defects, damage, or wear and tear, and only products that pass this test are put up for sale.
